transcript:
Customer: Jab jab tujhe pukara baba tu tha mere paas tere bal se main balwan baba tu

Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan haan ji

Executive: Nidhi Agrawal ji se baat ho rahi hai?

Customer: Haan ji boliye

Executive: Good evening mam, main Shahnawaz Talwar baat kar raha hun IndiaMART head office se, aapne interest show kiya hai video meeting ke liye.

Customer: Haan kiya hai.

Executive: Ji, to abhi aap join kar sakte hain?

Customer: Haan lekin meeting manager to Harshita thi na?

Executive: Video meeting sorry Harshita Agrawal jo hai na mam uske ghar mein shadi hai to abhi wo jaldi nikal gayi 4 baje office se. Meri team mein kaam karti hai wo, main unka senior manager hun mam.

Customer: Okay okay okay sorry mujhe pata nahi tha, I am really sorry about that.

Executive: Nahi nahi koi baat nahi wo Harshita ke ghar mein shadi thi to wo jaldi nikal gayi hai thodi. To wo abhi teen char din to office nahi aa payengi to main unka senior manager hun, meri hi team mein kaam karti hai wo to. Aapko agar kuch doubt hai ya koi query hai to aap mujhse puch sakte hain.

Customer: Haan sir bilkul mujhe doubt hai. To main apne laptop pe aa sakti hun aapke sath?

Executive: Haan ji bilkul main. Maine link aapko share kar diya hai mam.

Customer: Mail pe kiya aapne share sir?

Executive: Ji ji ji aap kahe to main aapko whatsapp pe bhi share kar deta hun.

Customer: Nahi nahi mail pe kiya theek hai main mail check kar leti hun, ek minute dijiye mujhe.

Executive: Check kar lijiye.

Customer: Main kar leti hun, ek minute.

Aur abhi abhi bhi diya aapne?

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Sir sir message to nahi aaya koi.

Executive: Kaunsi mail check kar rahe hain mam aap?

Customer: Nahi meri ek hi mail jispe ek message aayega ticket ID way number aaya hua hai.

Executive: Ek baar refresh kijiyega Nidhi Agrawal 24@gmail.com hai na aapki mail ID? Video meet with India video meet with IndiaMART team ke naam se aaya hoga.

Customer: Spam mein to nahi chala gaya ki pehla ek message to aur rakha hai. Ek minute dijiye spam mein.

Hum hum mujhe to nahi aaya, dobara bhej sakte hain sir aap? Dobara bhej dijiye ek baar na.

Executive: Dobara send kar deta hun.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Aapke laptop mein agar whatsapp login hai to whatsapp pe share kar dun?

Customer: Hmm haan phir whatsapp kar dijiye, dikkat nahi hai.

Executive: Just a second.

Hello

Executive: Ji mam.

Customer: Bhej diya na ab mil gaya. Haan message aaya aapka hello mam karke.

Executive: Ji maine link bhi share kar diya hai, aap mujhe koi message wapas bhej dijiye to aap screen pe na click kar payenge.

Customer: Main kar liya link pe click.

Executive: Ji mam.

Customer: Haan. Bataye screen share karna hoga na aapke sath? Haan ji haan ji haan ji, ek minute.

Ho gaya sir?

Executive: Abhi to nahi hua mam.

Customer: Option to karna.

Executive: Jo wo smiley bana hua hai na face uske left mein hi share screen ka option aata hai waha pe aap click karenge. Wahi se kar rahi hun. Entire entire screen ke upar click kiya aapne?

Customer: Haan wahi kar rahi hun main na.

Customer: Option kyun nahi aa raha hai share karne ka?

Customer: Share karne ka option kyun nahi aa raha hai?

Executive: Aapke samne jo wo dekhiye main batata hun share screen pe click kiya aapne?

Customer: Haan kiya.

Executive: Uske baad upar dekhiye entire screen likh raha hoga chrome tab window entire screen. Haan kar diya usko bhi maine click kar diya. Ab chhoti si jo screen hai na ab chhoti si screen hai uspe click kariye. Ho gaya ho gaya ho gaya. Ji ho gaya ji.

Customer: Ho gaya na?

Executive: Haan ji haan ji.

Customer: Hello

Executive: Ji. Hello. Aapko dikh raha hai mera screen? Aawaz aa rahi hai na?

Customer: Haan aawaz aa rahi hai. Screen dikh raha hai aapko sir?

Executive: Ji screen dikh rahi hai mam.

Customer: Sir ek baar mujhe isme cheeze kuch kuch confirm karne hai jaise abhi aap likhenge buyleads hai.

Executive: Haan ji.

Customer: Maine India kiya hua hai tab bhi mujhe agar main recent mein jaati hun recent mein jaati hun to char ya panch ghante pehle ki leads dikha raha hai. Aur abhi koi aas paas ki koi lead dikha hi nahi raha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to confirm about buyleads.

- Recent leads are 4-5 hours old.

- No nearby leads are being displayed.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the meeting link on WhatsApp.

- Executive guided the customer to share screen.

- Screen sharing was successful.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, screen sharing, meeting link
